overview: "Thanks to the Boris Lurie Art Foundation and its director Gertrude Stein – Boris's gallerist and closest friend – I am able, twenty years after producing the short movie in Manhattan, to present my hour-long film THE ART OF BORIS LURIE. A film which forms a dialogue with the 2016 retrospective at the Jewish Museum Berlin (JMB) but is characterized by my encounters with Boris Lurie and his art."
title: The Art of Boris Lurie
